Privacy.title: Privacy Policy
Privacy.section1Content: Structura Ludis is committed to protecting the privacy of its users. This policy describes how we collect, use, and protect your personal data in compliance with GDPR.
Privacy.section2Content: We only collect data necessary for the service to function:
Privacy.section3Content: Your data is used exclusively to allow you to book game sessions, receive notifications about your bookings, and improve your user experience. We never sell your data to third parties.
Privacy.section4Content: Under GDPR, you have the following rights:
Privacy.rights1: Right of access: view your personal data
Privacy.rights2: Right to rectification: correct your data
Privacy.rights3: Right to erasure: delete your account and data
Privacy.rights4: Right to portability: export your data
Privacy.section5Content: For any questions about your personal data, you can contact us through your account settings or at privacy@structuraludis.com.
